resources.string: Don\'t have an account? Signup here

An abundance of grandeur; a mountain of opulence; an attendance of the holy of the holiest. While divine architects and lords prepped the venue, guests from the fourteen worlds committed their presence. A marriage that is larger than life. This was how Lord Venkateshwara’s divine union with Goddess Padmavathi happened centuries ago. It is said that this celestial wedding is like nothing humankind has ever seen. Be a part of this auspicious event virtually.

Founded in the year 2006, OmKarmic is driving the mission of creating a world-class trusted platform for seekers of spirituality. In their efforts to encourage peace and religion, OmKarmic has partnered with institutions such as ISKCON and collaborated in projects like Annamrita.

Along with its vast range of spiritual, pooja, and meditation products, OmKarmic is coming up with a one-of-a-kind connected device—the E-mala Rosary. For every purchase made, OmKarmic takes up the responsibility to feed a child through their Annamrita tie-up.
